thread.title: John Terry is Chelsea's 'social media king', insists Gary Cahill
thread.title_full: John Terry is Chelsea's 'social media king', insists Gary Cahill

author: SAM LONG
title: John Terry is Chelsea's 'social media king', insists Gary Cahill
text:
Chelsea to make £8.5m profit on Bamford despite never playing him 
However, although Terry is no longer the centre of attention on the pitch he is attempting to stay in the frame off of it by getting involved in posts on social media. 
“John Terry is the social media king," Cahill insisted. "If there’s a picture going on, he’ll appear from nowhere and try to get tagged. 
"JT’s really keen at the moment. I’m not as mad as that, though. There’s a few like [Branislav] Ivanovic who won’t touch it." 
Terry does not have an official Twitter account but regularly uploads photographs to his Instagram page, which boasts almost 3 million followers. 
To read the full interview, pick up a copy of Match of the Day Magazine this Tuesday. More about:
